ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Thamud were destroyed by the Deafening Blast.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So destroyed were the Thamud by a storm of thunder and lightning;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Then the Thamud were destroyed by an awesome upheaval;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The Thamuds were destroyed by a violent blast of sound.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So regarding the Thamud, they were destroyed by a terrible scream.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: As for Thamud, they were destroyed by the Taghiyah!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then as to Samood, they were destroyed by an excessively severe punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: As for Thamood, they were destroyed by the Screamer;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: As for Thamud, they were destroyed by the lightning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: the Thamud were destroyed by a terrible storm of thunder and lightning;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: As for Thamud, they were destroyed by the outburst.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: As for Thamud, they were destroyed by the Cry.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But the Thamud,- they were destroyed by a terrible Storm of thunder and lightning!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: As for Thamud, they were destroyed by the awful cry!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Thamood, they were destroyed by the violent shout (of Gabriel),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: As for Thamood, they were annihilated by the Overwhelming.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So as for Thamud, they were destroyed by the overpowering [blast].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [69:5] As for Thamūd, they were destroyed by the [overwhelming] Roar, an excessively severe cry.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: 687 (As for Thamud, they were destroyed by the lightning) they were destroyed because of their transgression and idolatry; and it is said that their transgression drove them to disbelieve until they were destroyed.
